author: Amanda Yeo
title: 'Do your job': Stephen Colbert's radical fix for Trump's sinking coronavirus approval ratings
description:
"Disapproval of Trump is spreading faster than, than... something. Whatever spreads really quickly if you're dumb enough to ignore it," quipped Late Show host Stephen Colbert on Wednesday.
